post.body: Yep, voluntarily "spreading my wealth" in xchange for some garlic shrimp for lunch. ;-)
@kevinhogan Been fun. Gotta go solve this hunger issue that is now a rising crescendo. :)
LOL True Bush got a good headstart on BHO. But I have faith Obama will surpass. After all it's all about spreadin da wealth ;-)
@davelakhani Steelworkers Union 2 Paulson "U paid $125bil 4 securities worth $62 billion" http://snurl.com/71osj We r so screwed
W ur financial wit & knowledge of Mr Market, u wuld b very welcome 2 join @davelakhani @kevinhogan & I for beers (or red wine) :)
@kevinhogan Oh don't worry! The handouts for the kiddies ARE coming. BIG TIME! Just wait till 1/20/09 ;-)
@kevinhogan Paulson is screwing up everything. Spent 1st $125bil of TARP on $65bil worth of assets. Ur tax $ hard @ work ;-)
@davelakhani LMAO "i thought wisdom came from buddah"
Up for beers & discussion w u & @kevinhogan any time. :)
@kevinhogan Small biz is only hope for reversal. So long as gov't doesn't get in the way. Too many handouts spoils the kiddies
@kevinhogan Fed's CPFF took on >$250bil comm paper thru Nov 15. W a $1.8tril cap thy culd end up owning entire comm pape ...
Exactly my pt. Crowds (incl lenders & gov't) saw mrkt signals & kept going full speed. Wisdom comes frm independent observation
@davelakhani What cha think of fact Fed lending = <1% of total Fed assets; now it's nearly 50%? http://snurl.com/71e7g
"media isn't smart enough to start a recession on their own" Agree. But MSM's recession drumbeat has been going for last 4yrs+
Fed is not the only player on the stage. Shadow Banking System (comm paper) was house of cards built on faith in refinancing
Fed is complicit in financial meltdown. They set the stage (& trained the bankers) starting w Long Term Capital bailout in 98'.
Do agree re:"media amplifies" Tho many sheep only get their reality @ the MSM trough. We who use NewMedia sometimes 4get that
re:Crowdsourcing "able 2 faster report THEIR reality" Doesn't mean it IS reality. There is no "wisdom" in crowds, only info ;-)
Agree re: historical data. Disagree "recession" started yr ago tho. Downward trend magnified by private credit drying up.
That is a wicked cool name "Skull Candy"! Needed new wireless headphones & plugs 4 the gym. http://skullcandy.com Thnx ;-)
@FletchTheMaven Secrets 2 "Sheep are not responsible for the fences" r 4 sale...just not 2 sheep, shepherds or wolves. LOL
Thnx my man! Glad ur lovin your http://BLOGi360.com Hub Site. Hope you're taking advantage of the weekly & jumpStart webinars ;-)
Happy B'day my man! I hope you have a good one!! Maybe someone will get you a Sus500 B'day cake for Xtra monster gains. :))
Saw u just picked up Tribal Seduction Marketing-for-Life program Ur gonna luv it! Just n time only 36hrs left 4 special link
Obama's pledge was a populist move. I'm sure OPEC Prez sayin "no floor 4 price of barrel of oil" http://snurl.com/73fld helped :)
Lowering taxes=getting out of the way, no creation. Infra structure jobs=shell game No creation. Where's $ come frm 2 pay those ppl?
@daveconrey re: http://snurl.com/75w8o of course I don't expect masses 2 get it. But far 2 many biz owners have bought in
"If prolific listers aren't also prolific listing sellers, pretty soon they ain't prolific listers no mo" SO true 4 so many profs
u mean our BUSINESS leaders WERE very smart, right? :) 2day 2many r like JamesTaggart addicted 2 gov't injections of happy juice

http://snipurl.com/money-create is gr8 view in2 early issues of nat'l debt Tho Edison missed fact that > printed $ = deva ...
Cool to hear how http://BLOGi360.com has got ur traffic surging on ur BeachBody site! Can't wait to see ur tracking #s. ;-)
Automakers r acting like James Taggart, not Hank Rearden. Don't you agree?
Automakers could've stood up & broken free (frm Unions & CAFE standards, both r killing them) This is bandaid on knife wound
Ah yes! The iPhone external battery. Forgot about that :) @SeanWoodruff , that should boost u to 5hrs talk time ;-)
From what I've seen w @CoachDeb's use & gleened from @AboutLisa & other friends w iPhones the battery life issue is managable
This is my goal car in 12mo http://snipurl.com/gpowerm6 Supercharged M6 w 732hp 232mph top end. Comfort AND deadly speed :D

NOW THIS is why I'm movin 2 SoCal! http://snipurl.com/gymkhana (GR8 editing on vid) SO looking fwd 2 get back in2 racing! :)
I competed in Hunter & Open Jumper w my 18.5hand chestnut Thoroughbred. Cost 2day wuld be =2 Ferarri. Think M6 will come 1st :)
That's cuz it is Hawaii. :D No Shore of Oahu. Mountians r un-mistakable right? :)
Yeah, no horses here. ☹ 2 steep. 70yds from water but 150' elevation @ house. Would like 2 have horses again. Maybe in SoCal
Thnx! Reflection in window is from ocean side. I luv my mountainside tho ☺
http://twitpic.com/qpix - Where you headed to w your new passport? Skipping out & going Galt? lol
Not sure yet on SoCal location. Carlsbad maybe, or possibly Lake Hodges.
Thnx Amy. Anxious to get to SoCal. Island life has gotten a tad boring for me. ☻

Ur not gonna b alone 4 Xmas, ur welcome here. ☺

You're 22 right?

Moving to SoCal as soon as home here sells. Good traffic/ interest in house, so hopefully soon. ☺

Yep, economic cycles r SO predictable. Sadly shakeout of the losers necessary 4 market recovery is being thwarted by gov't.
Look fwd 2 today's post. Mark Twain said "History doesn't repeat itself, but it does rhyme" & we're rhyming w 1928 Germany ;-)
The masses didn't care in Atlas Shrugged either. 2 many dependent on teat of gov't (ur & my $) Rand was right in so many ways

Nope, didn't try G1. Just went w iPhone cuz of apps.
Dude u'd b proud. Went from 230lbs 18% body fat to 200 @ 9% bodyfat. Now to pack on 8lbs of muscle in next 5 wks ;-)

Where did u live in Hawaii?
True, it is HI. Trust me tho, if u saw what the stream bed @ back of the property looks like, u wouldn't want 2 b here now. :P
Thnx 4 offer. Checked all drainage, looks ok. On radar looks like it's backing off now. Maybe only 2" per hr. LOL
I got the kayak sittin @ the top of the driveway. ready to roll. LOL
I oft wonder how my "Grace bank" re:speeding tickets got so full. I think its cuz like u I know I deserve a ticket. Mst ppl argue
Like the way u put "distraction" in ur list 4 the iPhone. W all the apps available, it can become that. LOL
"It" is whatever u've been dreaming about, hoping 4, desiring... but not reaching 4 yet.
Wow! Oncologist huh!? Very cool! That makes for one hell of an action list. :)
Exactly. Some hires will say they want ownership. But few will carry the weight req'd even 4 profit sharing, more do-able tho
If employee has entrepreneurial mind they'll have their own biz Best employees have common sense but dont want weight of ownership
re: hiring "entrepreneurs-to-be" is a noble pursuit, but after 20yrs exp in biz can tell u that's like grasping smoke.
the Gym & saw Chrysler's head pubah crying about "industry in crisis." Sorry buddy, u 3 in Detroit do not qualify as an "industry."
